Breath-Disrupting Blast.name: Breath-Disrupting Blast
Breath-Disrupting Blast.flavor: Your blast of eldritch energy unsettles the dragon’s breath.
Breath-Disrupting Blast.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target takes a -1 penalty to attack rolls on close and area attacks until the end of your next turn. If the target is a dragon, it instead takes a -4 penalty to attack rolls on close and area attacks.

Ride the Burning Wind.name: Ride the Burning Wind
Ride the Burning Wind.flavor: You ride your enemy’s raging flame to safety.
Ride the Burning Wind.trigger: You are attacked by a close attack
Ride the Burning Wind.effect:
You teleport to a space of your choice outside the close attack’s area. If the attack hit you, you
take half damage. If the attack missed you, you take no damage.

Fearsome Gaze.name: Fearsome Gaze
Fearsome Gaze.flavor: Your direct a glare of pure malice at your foe, burning into its brain and soul.
Fearsome Gaze.onHit: 4d12 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). If the target is a dragon, it is instead stunned (save ends).
